name: livebook
description: Livebook is a self-hosted notebook application for running Elixir code, visualizing data, and creating interactive workflows. It includes collaboration features and integrates with machine learning tools and runtimes.
features: Interactive Notebooks: Elixir code execution, Data visualization, Live collaboration. Jupyter for Elixir.
Machine Learning: ML integrations, Data processing, Model training. Build ML workflows in Elixir.
Real-Time Collaboration: Multi-user editing, Shared sessions, Team workflows. Work together on notebooks.
Self-Hosted: Run locally, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your notebook environment.
